name: Audible
description: Enables staged deployments for vue applications.

name: W&H ioDent
description: A global IoT solution that connects medical devices like implant systems and sterilizers. The devices can be monitored and controlled via a web/mobile application to support dentists and service technicians in their daily business.

name: Hospital Ticketing System
description: A public ticketing system that lets users report concerns, danger points or malfunctions on the hospital area to the according administration.

name: Navigation App
description: Calculate the shortest routes to efficiently navigate between various locations in the hospital area. Employees and visotors can use it to find the best way to their desired station.

name: Template Project
description: A template project that provides the basis for all future web applications. It scaffolds a dotnet backend project with a react frontend that supports the two main authentication mechanisms. It also contains a component library for reusable react components that adhere to the corporate identity specifications.

name: Hospital Bed Statistics
description: An internal mobile application for hospitals that displays the number of beds currently occupied, reserverd or free to use. It was later rewritten into a PWA.

name: Hospital Waiting Times Statistics
description: An internal mobile application for hospitals that displays statistics and details about the waiting times at various stations. It was later rewritten into a PWA.
